we're crafting something quirky and adorable! its a trio of crazy, funny pals! if you're a beginner searching for an easy pattern, love cute, quirky amigurumi, this tutorial is perfect for you. 

what do you think of a mini frog, rooster and duck with bug eyes and a large mouth? and best of all, adjustable legs! these animals would make great bagcharms, hanging decor or cute, gag gifts. join us as we guide you through the entire process of making a funny frog, rooster and duck from start to finish.

with our easy-to-follow instructions, you'll have your own funny crazy pals in no time! whether you're a seasoned crocheter or just starting out, you'll find this funny crazy animal pals tutorial project both enjoyable and rewarding. 

you will need :
* yarn 
* **frog** - some green yarn with small amounts of red and white yarn
* **rooster** - some white yarn with small amounts of orange and red yarn
* **duck** - some yellow yarn with small amounts of orange and white
* crochet hook
* yarn needle
* stitch markers
* stuffing
* safety eyes or small amount of black yarn to sew on eyes
* strong glue or hot glue

i use 4ply milk cotton yarn and a 3mm hook. if you want your funny crazy pals to be the same size as mine, use any yarn that can fit well on a 3mm/no.5 hook

 in this tutorial, you'll learn:

* how to crochet a quirky set of animal friends
* step-by-step crochet instructions with detailed visuals
*tips on how to make three animals with almost the same set of  patterns
